English: How much money do you have in your wallet?
I am going to the bank to deposit my paycheck.
Spanish: Voy al banco para depositar mi cheque.

English: The stock market has been volatile lately.
Spanish: El mercado de valores ha sido muy inestable últimamente.

English: I need to borrow some money from the ATM.
Spanish: Necesito prestar dinero en la cajeros automática.

English: The economy is recovering slowly but steadily.
Spanish: La economía está recuperándose lentamente pero de manera sostenida.
